text:
A still very vaguely definied personal-use project that would allow querying a book-based knowledge base with NL unstructured questions.

A preliminary list of resources:

*from the [[HuggingFace AI Cookbook]], how to build a [[LLM, RAG based  "librarian"|https://huggingface.co/learn/cookbook/en/rag_llamaindex_librarian]].

* [[my note on a preliminary investigation|A brief note on RAG and LLM-powered document searches]], and the links therein.
* A very comprehensive, still work-in-progress [[book|https://mbrenndoerfer.com/books/language-ai-handbook#table-of-contents]] by Michael Brenndoerfer on AI approach to language processing.
* {{HuggingFace cookbook on LLM and Ai}}
*{{Courses on LLM}}
title: Building a LLM-enhanced "librarian"
description: How to build a tool that would do deep unstructured searches on a collection of books
